item.title: Wagner Exchange - LA Kings Insider
item.description: Wagner Exchange - LA Kings Insider Date Site Link 2022-10-23 [[LA Kings Insider]] Wagner Exchange - LA Kings Insider 2022-10-23 [[LA Kings Insider]] [[Sunday Roster Moves - Iafallo to LTIR + Moverare/Wagner Exchange - LA Kings Insider]] Contributors [[Zach Dooley]] Summary The Kings have assigned defenseman Jacob Moverare to AHL-Ontario and have recalled forward Austin Wagner from the Reign.
